title: Mobile Formative Assessment-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environments for working professionals, utilizing personal mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously improve mathematical problem-solving processes by over 80% through formative assessments in mobile environments.
Learners can apply at least three strategies to manage cognitive load in digitally-integrated physical-context tasks.
Learners can enhance the completeness of problem-solving projects by over 20% using peer feedback and real-time formative assessment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
